name: css.vim
description:
CSS with ASP.NET Support (.css.aspx)

It colors only directives, not C# or VB.NET code.
install_details:
Override vim/vim63/syntax/css.vim with the script. (Copying to vimfiles/syntax/ may not work) 

Add the following line to your vimrc: 
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.css.aspx setlocal filetype=css
